item.title: Slippery paving, 9th February

item.title: Rubbish dumped outside HMO, 9th February
item.description:
61 hearns road a HMO has dumped their rubbish in the street again. HMO rules they must have a place to store bins. Obviously not the case here and just dumping waste in the street. Bramley Council need to review the waste storage in this HMO and educate the tenants to when bin day is. General waste will not be picked up for another week.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 61, Hearns Road, St Paul's Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Streetlight still not working, 9th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lodge Road, Sundridge, Greater London
